extendedInfo.description: Virijallu is the first of its kind telugu radio show on klok 1170 am that promises wholesome entertainment to one and all melodious songs, interesting topics, celebrity guests, beauty tips, culinary tricks, rib tickling comedy and lot more entertaining programs are in store in this power packed radio show!â Weekdays (Mon-Fri) 7-8 PM PSTâ Weekends (Sat/Sun) 1-3 PM PST- on DESI 1170 AM station in Bay Area.Can also be listened worldwide using the Listen Live button on the websiteKey Features:- Listen Virijallu Radio in Foreground and Background- You can request a song to played on Virijallu Show- You can call Show- You can share on Facebook.- You can share by Email.- You can see more details about show.- You can checkout Contests- To stop Radio, launch Virijallu App and hit the Stop button.PS: If you exit the app after clicking play button, the radio will restart after a brief interruption, we suggest to click Menu/Home buttonFor more details, visit http://www.virijallu.com
